001package com.github.sormuras.bach.workflow;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.command.ModulePathsOption;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.project.ProjectSpace;
007import java.nio.file.Files;
008import java.nio.file.Path;
009
010public abstract class AbstractSpaceWorkflow extends AbstractProjectWorkflow {
011
012  protected final ProjectSpace space;
013
014  protected AbstractSpaceWorkflow(Bach bach, Project project, ProjectSpace space) {
015    super(bach, project);
016    this.space = space;
017  }
018
019  protected int computeReleaseVersionFeatureNumber() {
020    return space.release() == 0 ? Runtime.version().feature() : space.release();
021  }
022
023  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForModules(ProjectSpace space) {
024    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "modules");
025  }
026
027  protected Path computeOutputDirectoryForReports() {
028    return bach.path().workspace(space.name(), "reports");
029  }
030
031  protected ModulePathsOption computeModulePathsOption() {
032    var paths = ModulePathsOption.empty();
033    for (var parent : space.parents()) paths = paths.add(computeOutputDirectoryForModules(parent));
034    var externalModules = bach.path().externalModules();
035    if (Files.isDirectory(externalModules)) paths = paths.add(externalModules);
036    return paths;
037  }
038}
